security_audit.summary: This is a pure documentation skill containing only markdown guidance. No executable code, no scripts, no file system access, no network operations. All 31 static findings are false positives caused by the analyzer misinterpreting markdown backticks as shell execution and JSON metadata fields as security issues.

content.user_title: Optimize AI prompts for better results
content.value_statement: Poorly crafted prompts lead to inconsistent AI responses. This skill provides expert techniques for designing effective prompts including few-shot learning, chain-of-thought reasoning, and clear output formatting to improve LLM performance.
actual_capabilities: Creates prompts with clear structure and role definitions
Implements few-shot learning with example-based prompts
Uses chain-of-thought reasoning for complex tasks
Optimizes prompts for better LLM response quality
Designs effective system prompts for AI agents
limitations: Does not execute code or interact with external systems
Does not provide real-time prompt testing capabilities
Does not integrate with specific LLM APIs directly
Requires user to apply recommendations manually

use_cases.title: Build Better AI Agents
use_cases.description: Design effective prompts for custom AI agents and assistants that produce consistent, high-quality outputs.

use_cases.title: Improve AI Writing
use_cases.description: Craft prompts that generate better written content with fewer revisions and more accurate results.

use_cases.title: Optimize LLM Interactions
use_cases.description: Enhance data analysis prompts with structured reasoning and clear output specifications for reliable results.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Optimization
prompt_templates.prompt: Optimize this prompt for better results: [insert your prompt]

prompt_templates.title: System Prompt
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a system prompt for a [role] that specializes in [task]. Include constraints and output format.

prompt_templates.title: Few-Shot Examples
prompt_templates.prompt: Implement few-shot learning for this task: [describe task]. Provide 3 example input-output pairs.

prompt_templates.title: Reasoning Prompts
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a chain-of-thought prompt for [complex task]. Include step-by-step reasoning requirements.

output_examples.input: Optimize this prompt: Write a good blog post about coding
output: Role: Expert technical writer with 10 years experience
Task: Write a blog post about [topic]
Output Format: Introduction, 3 main sections with headers, conclusion
Examples: Show sample opening paragraph and conclusion

best_practices: Define a clear role and expertise level for the AI to adopt
Provide 2-3 concrete examples demonstrating desired output format
Break complex tasks into explicit step-by-step reasoning steps
anti_patterns: Using vague instructions like 'write good content' instead of specific requirements
Overloading prompts with too many constraints at once
Skipping examples when output format matters significantly

faq.question: Which AI tools work with this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for prompt optimization tasks.

faq.question: How many examples should I include?
faq.answer: Use 2-3 examples for few-shot learning. Too few lacks guidance, too many wastes context.

faq.question: Can I combine multiple techniques?
faq.answer: Yes, combine role definition, few-shot examples, and chain-of-thought reasoning for complex tasks.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: This skill is purely documentation-based. No data is stored or transmitted externally.

faq.question: Why are my AI responses inconsistent?
faq.answer: Inconsistent prompts lead to variable results. Use clear structure, examples, and constraints for reliability.

faq.question: How is this different from generic prompt tips?
faq.answer: This skill provides specific, actionable patterns backed by LLM interaction best practices.
